rewrite1:
Please make the following adjustments to the formatting of the document:

- In the sixth paragraph, set the spacing above the paragraph to one line and ensure the text is not bolded.

- For the eighth paragraph, modify the Outline Level to 'Body Text'. Apply the hex color #FFFF00 to the font and use a lime color for the text highlight. Additionally, remove any italic styling present in the text.

- Moving on to the fourth paragraph, implement 1.5 lines of line spacing and adjust the indentation to a 1 character First Line indent. Remove any existing highlight from the text and apply a right indent of negative 2 centimeters.
rewrite2:
"To format the sixth paragraph, please set the spacing before the text to one line and ensure that the text is not in bold.

Moving on to the eighth paragraph, adjust the Outline Level to 'Body Text'. Then, modify the font color using the hex code #FFFF00 and apply a lime-colored highlight. Also, please remove any italic formatting from this section.

For the fourth paragraph, implement a line spacing of 1.5 lines. Set the indentation for the first line to 1 character. Additionally, remove any previous highlight from the text and apply a right indent of negative 2 centimeters."
rewrite3:
Please modify the formatting for the sixth paragraph by setting the space before the paragraph to one line and removing any bold formatting from the text.

For the eighth paragraph, alter the Outline Level to 'Body Text'. Please format the font color using the hex code #FFFF00 and apply a lime-colored highlight to the text. Ensure that the italic style is turned off.

Regarding the fourth paragraph, adjust the line spacing to 1.5 lines and configure the indentation so that the first line is indented by 1 character. Remove any existing highlight formatting and set a right indent of negative 2 centimeters.
